title: Seattle City Council Public Safety & Human Services Committee of 2/22/2022
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

Pursuant to Washington State Governor's Proclamation No. 20-28.15 and Senate Concurrent Resolution 8402, this public meeting will be held remotely. Meeting participation is limited to access by the telephone number provided on the meeting agenda, and the meeting is accessible via telephone and Seattle Channel online. 
Agenda: Call to Order; Approval of the Agenda; Public Comment; Seattle Police Department (SPD) 2021 Year-End Staffing Report & Year-End Crime Report; Seattle Police Department (SPD) Retail Theft Program.
0:00 Call to Order
1:17 Public Comment
27:30 SPD 2021 Year-End Staffing Report & Year-End Crime Report
1:45:17 SPD Retail Theft Program
